info.name: Edit Files with Microsoft Office
info.summary: Open files with Microsoft Office for editing (via WebDav)
info.description: This App is a modified version of "Edit Files via LibreOffice" by allotropia software GmbH. It adds a new context menu to supported Office-Files to edit them directly in PowerPoint, Word or Excel without downloading and reuploading them via WebDAV.
info.author: BurningScript
